For areas outside the Australian EEZ where Landsat 8 and Sentinel 2 imagery were not available, Sentinel 3 was processed through Sentinel Hub to collect imagery of specific reef features. These were then used to draw rough boundaries.

All images were exported with the following settings:

Downloaded with Analytical
Image format: TIFF (16 bit)
Image resolution: High (1956 x 987 px)
Coordinate system: WGS 84
Clip extra bands: True
Layers: Custom

# Coral Sea Australia

## Selfridge Bank
This bank is highlighted on the marine charts, but was just outside the range of available Landsat and Sentinel 2 imagery. This feature is just on the edge of the Australian EEZ. This feature is at the edge of visibility, at a depth of 44 m on the marine chart. All days from 2022-03-07 through to 2022-09-20 were reviewed to find the clearest imagery. This feature was confirmed in 4 images and the best 3 images were downloaded. 

Image dates: 2022-03-07,2022-04-13, 2022-07-11
https://apps.sentinel-hub.com/eo-browser/?zoom=11&lat=-20.89346&lng=157.13367&themeId=DEFAULT-THEME&visualizationUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fservices.sentinel-hub.com%2Fogc%2Fwms%2F82f84fab-9b1c-4322-beeb-207b0f05afef&%3D&datasetId=S3OLCI&fromTime=2022-03-07T00%3A00%3A00.000Z&toTime=2022-03-07T23%3A59%3A59.999Z&demSource3D=%22MAPZEN%22#custom-script

## Obstn Rep(1962)
This is an observation at 18 m, near Kenn Reefs at 156.36, -21.634. The dotted boundary on the marine chart indicates that it is not a confirmed feature by AHO. No feature was found in the imagery, however we should note that Sentinel 3 has a 300 m resolution and so small features could be missed.
Image dates: 2022-09-23, 2022-09-17

https://apps.sentinel-hub.com/eo-browser/?zoom=10&lat=-21.67019&lng=156.3533&themeId=DEFAULT-THEME&visualizationUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fservices.sentinel-hub.com%2Fogc%2Fwms%2F82f84fab-9b1c-4322-beeb-207b0f05afef&%3D&datasetId=S3OLCI&fromTime=2022-09-23T00%3A00%3A00.000Z&toTime=2022-09-23T23%3A59%3A59.999Z&demSource3D=%22MAPZEN%22#custom-script

# New Caledonia

There are lots of large reefs systems in the Coral Sea on the New Caledonia side. For these reefs we have partial coverage with Sentinel 2 and Landsat. The low resolution Sentinel 3 imagery was collected to ensure this area had complete coverage.

These banks are on the southern edge of the Coral Sea near the Tasman Sea. These features are poorly represented in most maps.
